page.title: 04AROUND NETHER ALDERLEY
page.content: Places to Look At 1. The Wizard Hotel This reminds us of the legend of Alderley Edge (see page 14) 2. Welsh Row Supposed to be named after the miners from Wales who came to work in the copper mines (see page13) 3.Nether Alderley School Built in 1822 extended in 1867 (see page10) 4.The Old School House This is where the blacksmiths apprentice used to live 5.The Mill House Mr Rawlins the miller lived there in 1912 6.The Smithy A thatched blacksmiths forge used to be on this site 7.The Obelisk Built in 1750 A reminder ot the eagle and the child (see page 15)
